WSUS32 KKCI 240155 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 8C 
VALID UNTIL 0355Z 
KS 
FROM 20NNE ICT-60NW OSW-60SE ICT-20S ICT-20NNE ICT 
AREA TS MOV FROM 24025KT. TOPS TO FL240. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 240355-240755 
FROM HLC-50NNW ARG-40SE LIT-LRD-DLF-TTT-50SSW TCC-HLC 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
